changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Supression forcé des \" lors d'un calcul: Forced deletion of "during a calculation on an order
changelog.md.Correction de bug de calcul si le résult: Correction of calculation bug if the result is "False"
changelog.md.Correction de l'arrondit forcé sur 2 chi: Correction of forced rounding to 2 digits on digital controls
changelog.md.Ajout d'un systeme de template pour crée: Adding a template system to quickly create equipment
changelog.md.Ajout d'une securité en cas de boucle in: Addition of security in case of infinite loop
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les valeurs décl: Correction of a bug on the values triggering an update of an info command
changelog.md.Correction de l'erreur lors de la copie: Correction of the error when copying a device if the Refresh command exists

index.md.Le plugin Virtual (virtuel) permet la cr: The Virtual plugin allows the creation of virtual devices and their properties
index.md.Nous nommerons un périphérique créé par: We will name a device created by this plugin
index.md.Un périphérique virtuel peut être créé p: A virtual device can be created for the following needs
index.md.consolider dans un seul périphérique des: consolidate information or actions from several physical / virtual devices into a single device;
index.md.créer un périphérique alimenté par une s: create a peripheral powered by a source external to Jeedom (Zibase, IPX800, etc.);
index.md.dupliquer un équipement pour le scinder: duplicate equipment to split it into 2, for example;
index.md.effectuer un calcul sur plusieurs valeur: perform a calculation on several equipment values;
index.md.Le plugin ne nécessite aucune configurat: The plugin does not require any configuration, you just have to activate it
index.md.La configuration des équipements virtuel: The configuration of virtual devices is accessible from the plugin menu
index.md.Voilà à quoi ressemble la page du plugin: This is what the virtual plugin page looks like (here with already an equipment)
index.md.Voilà à quoi ressemble la page de config: This is what the configuration page of a virtual device looks like
index.md.Comme à beaucoup d'endroits sur Jeedom,: As in many places on Jeedom, putting the mouse on the far left allows a quick access menu to appear (you can always leave it visible from your profile)
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.les catégories de l'équipement (il peut: equipment categories (it can belong to several categories)
index.md.le rend visible sur le dashboard: makes it visible on the dashboard
index.md.vous permet de mettre des commentaires s: allows you to comment on equipment
index.md.En haut à droite vous avez accès à 4 bou: At the top right you have access to 4 buttons
index.md.le testeur d'expressions identique à cel: the expression tester identical to that of the scenarios to facilitate the development of some virtual
index.md.permet de dupliquer automatiquement un é: allows to automatically duplicate an existing equipment in a virtual one (saves time to split an equipment in 2 for example)
index.md.permet d'afficher les options avancées d: displays advanced equipment options (common to all Jeedom plugins)
index.md.En-dessous vous retrouvez la liste des c: Below you find the list of orders
index.md.le nom affiché sur le dashboard: the name displayed on the dashboard
index.md.permet de donner la valeur de la command: allows to give the value of the command according to another command, a key (when we make a virtual switch), a calculation, etc
index.md.Valeur de retour d'état\" et \"Durée ava: Status feedback value "and" Duration before status feedback
index.md.permet d'indiquer à Jeedom qu'après un c: allows to indicate to Jeedom that after a change on the information its value must return to Y, X min after the change
index.md.dans le cas d'un détecteur de présence q: in the case of a presence detector which emits only during a presence detection, it is useful to set for example 0 in value and 4 in duration, so that 4 minutes after a detection of movement (and s' there has been no news since) Jeedom resets the value of the information to 0 (more movement detected)
index.md.permet d'afficher la donnée sur le dashb: allows to display the data on the dashboard
index.md.dans le cas du RFXcom cette case doit to: in the case of RFXcom this box must always be checked because you cannot interrogate an RFXcom module
index.md.permet d'afficher la configuration avanc: displays the advanced configuration of the command (logging method, widget, etc.)
index.md.Pour faire un interrupteur virtuel, il v: To make a virtual switch, you need to add 2 virtual commands like this
index.md.Puis vous sauvegardez et là Jeedom va au: Then you save and there Jeedom will automatically add the virtual information command
index.md.(cela permet à Jeedom de faire le lien a: (this allows Jeedom to make the link with the state command)
index.md.Pour avoir un joli widget, il vous faut: To have a nice widget, you need to hide the status command
index.md.Affectez un widget qui gère le retour d': Assign a widget that manages the status feedback to the 2 action commands, for example here the light widget
index.md.Pour ce faire cliquez sur la petite roue: To do this click on the small notched wheel in front of the control
index.md.Enregistrez et faites de même pour la co: Save and do the same for the order
index.md.Et vous obtiendrez un joli widget qui ch: And you will get a nice widget that will change state when clicked
index.md.Pour faire un slider virtuel, il faut aj: To make a virtual slider, add a virtual command like this
index.md.Comme tout à l'heure après la sauvegarde: As before after the backup, Jeedom will automatically create the info command
index.md.Et comme tout à l'heure il est conseillé: And as before, it is advisable to link the action to the status command and to hide it
index.md.Voilà comment faire un interrupteur de t: This is how to make a switch of type toggle, for that you have to create a virtual command of this type
index.md.Ensuite vous sauvegardez pour voir appar: Then you save to see the status command appear
index.md.Ici il faut dans la valeur de la command: Here it is necessary in the value of the action command to put
index.md.(bien remplacer par votre propre command: (replace with your own command) and link the state to the action command (be careful, you should not hide the state command this time)
index.md.Il faut aussi passer la commande info en: You must also place the info command in binary subtype
index.md.Pour faire un calcul sur de multiples co: To do a calculation on multiple orders, it's very easy
index.md.Il suffit de créer une commande de type: Just create a virtual information type order and in the value field put your calculations
index.md.Le testeur d'expression peut vous aider: The expression tester can help you with this step to validate
index.md.Plusieurs points à réaliser correctement: Several points to be done correctly
index.md.Bien choisir le sous-type en fonction du: Choose the subtype according to the type of information (here averaging so it's a numeric)
index.md.Mettre des parenthèses dans les calculs,: Put parentheses in the calculations, this allows you to be sure of the result of the operation
index.md.Cocher la case pour historiser si nécess: Check the box to log if necessary
index.md.Nous allons voir ici comment faire une c: We will see here how to make an order which will turn off 2 lights
index.md.Rien de plus simple, il suffit de créer: Nothing could be simpler, just create a virtual order and put the 2 orders separated by a
index.md.Ici, il faut bien que le sous-type de la: Here, the command subtype must be the same as the controlled command subtypes, so all commands in the value field must have the same subtype (all "other", or all "slider ", or all color)
index.md.Lors de l'utilisation d'un équipement qu: When using equipment which does not have a status feedback and if this equipment is controlled only by Jeedom, it is possible to have a virtual status feedback
index.md.Il faut pour cela créer un virtuel qui r: This requires creating a virtual that takes the actions commands (ex
index.md.On & Off) de l'équipement et qui possède: On & Off) of the equipment and which has an info command (the status)
index.md.Il faut ensuite renseigner la colonne Pa: You must then complete the Parameter column for each action command, by selecting the name of the info command (status) and giving the value it must take
index.md.On peut aussi imaginer un virtuel qui al: We can also imagine a virtual one that turns on / off several lamps (actions commands separated by &&) and thus have a status of this general command
index.md.Il est possible de changer la valeur d'u: It is possible to change the value of virtual information by a
index.md.Attention à bien rajouter un \/jeedom ap: Be careful to add a / jeedom after \
